admin_authorized_keys.description: SSH public authorized key(s) for the admin user

root_authorized_keys.description: SSH public authorized key(s) for the root user

root_ssh_rsa.description: private SSH rsa key for root user

root_ssh_rsa_pub.description: public SSH rsa key for root user (mostly not required)

root_known_hosts.description: known_hosts file information for root user

mail_auth_user.description: smtp username if authentication is required

mail_adminaddr.description: admin email address alias for all mails to root@localhost

ssh_host_rsa_key.description: private SSH rsa key for the host daemon

ssh_host_rsa_key.pub.description: public SSH rsa key for the host daemon

ssh_host_dsa_key.description: private SSH dsa key for the host daemon

ssh_host_dsa_key.pub.description: public SSH dsa key for the host daemon

rocketchat_database.description: only use this if the name of the rocket.chat database is different to rocket

rocketchat_api.description: set to true if you want to use the rocket.chat api

rocketchat_instances.description: default is 1. Set to 2 for two running node instances

nextcloud_url.description: url of a nextcloud instance for mongodump-backup. can only be used if mongodb_url is empty

nextcloud_user.description: user of a nextcloud instance for mongodump-backup. can only be used if mongodb_url is empty

nextcloud_password.description: password of a nextcloud instance for mongodump-backup. can only be used if mongodb_url is empty

mongodump_url.description: download-link for a mongodump-backup tar.bz2 file. can only be used if mongodb_url is empty

filesystem_restore.description: set to true if mongodb filesystem-restore is available

mongodb_url.description: url with credencials for external mongodb. leave blank for localhost
